project.name: SVNAdmin
project.description:
The aim of SVNAdmin is to make handling of authentication and authorization for SVN-Repositories as easy as possible.
Some features: * Authentication against MySql and/or LDAP, SAMBA, XML etc.. * Authorization against AuthzSVNAccessFile (Per-Directory Access Control) * Assign SVN-Repositories to projects * Devide users into groups and subgroups * Display the Project/Repository-Relation and the Group/User-Relation in an Explorer-like web-interface * Grant/Revoke permissions (read, write, owner) on projects/repositories to groups/users via the webinterface
Prerequisites: * apache2 (with libapache2-mod-svn) * subversion * php5

license.name: gpl3_or_later
license.nice_name: GNU General Public License v3.0 or later
